abstract: Picking up the pieces and trying again.
description: Two months into their relationship, Lucy Pucci told her partner that she has Turner's Syndrome and won't be able to have children. He stuck by her then, just as he has stuck by her through their various agonising attempts to have children of their own.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002121; Hidden treasure : thoughts about living with Turner's Syndrome : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2006
